title: Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641, Premium Hand Protection from Welder and Cutting Torch Heat, Commercial Quality, Cotton Lined, Gauntlet Cuff, Unisex, Grey, One Size
descriptions:
Meet the Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641—built for pros, trusted by anyone who takes heat, sparks, and durability seriously. Crafted from premium split cowhide Grade A leather and reinforced with Kevlar stitching, these heavy-duty gloves deliver commercial-quality protection you can feel from the first strike to the final bead.

Engineered for high-heat environments, they’re heat, flame, and chemical resistant to stand up to MIG and stick welding, cutting torches, and tough shop work. A fully welted, lock-stitched construction resists wear and tear, while the soft cotton fleece lining keeps hands comfortable through long sessions. The winged thumb design enhances grip and dexterity, so you maintain precise control without sacrificing protection.

The 13.5-inch gauntlet cuff shields wrists and forearms from sparks and slag, and the unisex, one-size design fits most hands with room for movement. Finished in a professional gray, this pair combines rugged strength with all-day comfort—because your hands deserve the same tough reliability as your tools.

Includes 1 pair of Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641. Put them on, turn up the heat, and get the job done right.
